sagex.phoenix.util

Class PhoenixManagedScriptEngine<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sagex.phoenix.util.PhoenixScriptEngine
      • sagex.phoenix.util.PhoenixManagedScriptEngine<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class PhoenixManagedScriptEngine<T>
extends PhoenixScriptEngine
    A script engine that manages a script file. ie, it will take care of reloading the file and recreating the environment in the event that the script file changes.

    You just need to call getObjectInstance() any time you need to access the typed object instance.
